ModMetaData.name: Waffles - Strawberries and Cream
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.0[/h1]
From the modder who brought you milkshakes that caused mass lactose intolerance-induced diarrhoea across the Rim, I present to you: [b]Strawberries and Cream Waffles[/b]!
This mod adds a new craftable recreation/luxury food (like chocolate).
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]Strawberries and Cream Waffles (Recreation/Luxury Food) [/list] Grants Mood Buff (2) for 18 hours after consumption.
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595980371]Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colors[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2622691963]Ancient Crystals[/url] [/list]
[b]Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]Compatible as long as you're not lactose intolerant. [*]Persons with strawberry allergy should exercise caution. [/list]
[b]Balance:[/b] A waffle a day keeps the sad away.
[url=https://discord.gg/rimworld]Click here to join us on the Community Discord![/url]
